body.name: Water Bottle Insulated 32oz 40oz 64oz 128oz Straw Lid Spout Lid & 3 Lids, Leak Proof, Vacuum Insulated,Stainless Steel Water Bottle Wide Mouth for Sports, Gym or Office, BPA-Free Keep Cold 24H Hot 12H
features: Food grade 18/8 stainless steel, The unique ThermoArmour technology inside this insulated water bottle keeps beverage cold up to 24 hours and hot up to 12 hours

【SMART DESIGN WIDE MOUTH DUST LID 】 The new patent straw lid have a dust cover ,it is keeping the spout clean and covered between uses, as well as for a handy little lever with which is easily and quickly flip the spout open, vs having to pry it up with your fingertips. another new patent Push-Button Lid designed for an easy, one-handed drinking experience. The chug-lid design opens with the push of a button for high liquid flow and one-handed drinking

【PREMIUM 18/8 STAINLESS STEEL】The insulated water bottle is made of 18/8 stainless steel with double-walled that will not break.Exclusive use of vacuum copper plating technology- The exterior of the vacuum sealed area is dipped in copper for added insulation. Copper reduces the transfer of temperature, adding even more insulation to your bottle.

【EASY TO USE】Lid with handle AND pouch for easy carrying. While sitting anywhere in any temperature condition, 32oz this volume is enough for your daily hydration.3 lids can be switched at any time, the Spout Lid is perfect for the beach, camping, the straw lid fit for office and hiking, And the powder coating exterior finish ensures a better grip, and its wide-mouth opening makes your ice or fruits filling and cleaning easy and fast.

【BPA FREE AND LEAK PROOF】POYAKU water bottle with straw lids are BPA free,food-safe,it keeps your ice drink COLD for up to 24 hours, and HOT for up to 12 hours,Make sure your every sip is the felling you want.The 3 replacement lids seal well and are 100% leak-proof, so you can drink on the go without spilling, and don't worry get wet and putting it in your bag.

【A FULL PACK】: Included with 3 lids, 2 straws, 1 straw brush, the POYAKU insulated bottle is fully accessorized to handle any tricky situations. We offer lifetime warranty,and our friendly customer care are always happy to help,risk-free purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy the fun of large flow of drinking water. A practical and convenient one-button opening for one-handed operation

High quality vacuum insulated double walled wide mouth stainless steel water bottle SUS 304 (18/8) food grade stainless steel High-quality materials-SYACOT Water Bottle (wide mouth) is made from premium high grade 18/8 stainless steel, which is fully resistant to oxidation and corrosion. More durable, and suitable for adults and children. Wide mouth is easy to add ice cubes and wash Wide Mouth-Easy to drink, easy to stuff with ice-cubes, supper easy to clean. you can easily carry the reusable water bottle to anywhere you like. The SYACOT water bottle is a great gift for any occasion. Vacuum insulated stainless steel water bottle - cold for 48 Hrs/hot for 24 Hrs Vacuum Insulated-The unique TempArmour technology inside this insulated water bottle keeps beverage cold up to 48 hours and hot up to 24 hours

Auto Spout Lid Push-button lid is designed for an easy, one-handed drinking experience. The chug-lid design opens or closes with the button for free style. Dust Straw Lid Using the dust cover to open the nozzle is easier than the traditional opening method, the dust cover can prevent dust from entering, and avoid touching the nozzle by hand, convenient and sanitary. Leak-proof design Built for easy drinking on the go, the lid is leak proof when the nozzle is in the closed position. you can easily carry the reusable water bottle to anywhere you like. The POYAKU water bottle is a great gift for any occasion.
The stainless steel water bottle comes with straw lid and spout lid- Matching of different colors to suit different occasions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am so glad I got this
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad I got this. I was actually going to use it as an extra bottle to have in my car but now I wound up using it all the time. This keeps my drinks very cold and fresh. The seal on. It is amazing when I open the lid to pop pop it open to drink from the straw lid you can hear the seal open it's does not leak at all. I love it very much. I use it all the time it has become my every day use a bottle from my tease infused teas to my ice waters to my smoothies and energy drinks. I love this, it's not too big and it's not too small. It gives you enough liquid at hold enough liquid for the entire day. Unless of course you drink like a water buffalo lol which I do in the summer but for winter time this is great weather it's hot teas, Coco, Tico, or ice waters or juices. It keeps everything warm. It keeps everything very cold And it's beautiful the outside I got the floral one and it's beautiful. Very very nice and it's easy to clean. You can actually get a brush a bottle brush in side to scrub it out and clean it. It's very nice which I also love which is why I got this one. I wanted one that was easy to clean as well as keep my beverages either hot or cold. This fits the bill very pleased with my purchase. I give this a five stars. One more thing I will add is it's so nice in quality and the company gives you three lids for different conveniences of drinking different liquids. Amazing. Awesome thank you :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size, stays super cold
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is perfect both in size and quality. It keeps ice in it for over 24 hours. It’s super durable and has multiple types of lids so however you’d like to drink water, it is available in whatever way you’d like. Highly recommended by our family plus the price is amazing for the size and quality! I’d pay double for it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Build very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Strong build quality. The paint refuses to chip even after a couple drops on concrete. The 3 lids are nice, though I only use one. The one with a straw is awkward due to the square shape. Liquid stays ice cold for about 15 hours from my testing. Haven't out hot liquids so idk. Oer all 5 stars without a doubt. Will order more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comes with carrying straps, insulation sleeve, no odor or unpleasant smell/flavor when used. However, I'm not used to lugging around an item that weighs as much as my purse. *LOL* It's way to big for a car holder, if you could strap it to a bike would be easier to haul around. Nice weapon if needed, you could clonk a persons lights out if needed and I'd doubt if it would take a dent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than hydroflask
reviews.reviewText: Ice doesn't melt. I make long drives for work and love this water bottle. Great price and comes with 3 different lids for your preference. Straws included and comes with cleaning tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice product
reviews.reviewText: For the 64oz one. Been using this every day for 3 weeks now. No leaks. Has 3 options for drinking preference. Functions well, design is beautiful. Comes with a shoulder strap, usefully for travel. Last me all through my 10hr shifts.Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love my cup! Keeps water with ice cold for about 2 days! The different lids are amazing. Great value with 3 lids, straw brush and extra straws. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and durability
reviews.reviewText: I've ordered 3 of these now because I love them so much! My ice water stays cold for days, even taking it to work with me in a hot factory. I have gotten one for my husband and son now also and they love them just as much.
